alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Conecuh; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 2:05AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL BALDWIN...WESTERN ESCAMBIA AND SOUTHWESTERN CONECUH COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM CST... At 204 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Poarch Creek Reservation to 5 miles northeast of I65 And AL 21. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atmore, Brewton, McCullough, East Brewton, Castleberry, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 113, I65 And AL 21, and Poarch Creek Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for south central Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 AM CST for south central Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
